medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening of hearing on the right side.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms of fluctuating bilateral mixed hearing loss began at an unspecified time. The hearing loss is described as worse on the left side than on the right, with overall progressive deterioration despite unsuccessful steroid treatment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of fluctuating bilateral mixed hearing loss and clinical diagnosis of type 1 osteogenesis imperfecta.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's son also has a clinical diagnosis of osteogenesis imperfecta.
